'''Genshin Impact × McDonald's''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and {{w|McDonald's}}.

==Collaborations==
To date, there has been '''1''' collaborations between ''Genshin Impact'' and McDonald's.

===2024 - Beidou and Kaedehara Kazuha===
This collaboration features two McDonald's food items, with a custom theme centered around [[Beidou]] and [[Kaedehara Kazuha]].

These include:
* Genshin Impact Apple Pie
* Genshin Impact Deluxe McCrispy&trade;

Additionally, the menu items also comes with a redemption code:

* "Genshin Impact × McDonald's" Apple Pie Redemption Code:
** {{Item|Primogem|x=40}}
** {{Item|Mora|x=20.000}}
** Recipe: {{Item|Recipe|link=Golden Apple Pastry|text=Recipe: Golden Apple Pastry|20|x=1}}
** Food Item: {{Item|Golden Apple Pastry|x=3}}
** {{Item|Mystic Enhancement Ore|x=4}}
** {{Item|Hero's Wit|x=2}}
* "Genshin Impact × McDonald's" Deluxe Meal Redemption Code:
** Wing Glider: {{Item|Wings of Delicacies|x=1}}
** Namecard: {{Item|Celebration: Crispy and Sweet|x=1}}

Each redemption code type will be limited to 1 use per Genshin Impact account. The same character cannot use redemption codes of the same type more than once.
